plot: A young man who says 'bless you' whenever someone sneezes, even if he doesn't know the person, discovers that no one really cares about him or his action.
title: Bless You
plot_es: A young man who says 'bless you' whenever someone sneezes, even if he doesn't know the person, discovers that no one really cares about him or his action.
plot_en: A young man who says 'bless you' whenever someone sneezes, even if he doesn't know the person, discovers that no one really cares about him or his action.
